page.title: 12ELECTRICITY
page.content: Canna is not connected to the National Grid. Electricity to each household is supplied by its own or a shared diesel generator. The generators are usually running for set periods in the evening and in the morning too during the winter. This means that during the day there is no electricity to power refrigerators, washing machines,radios etc. unless a generator is especially required. Even when the generators are running there is a limit to the power available, only 3KW in some houses. There are 5 generators on Canna with a total maximum output of 49KW. The diesel comes on the ferry from Mallaig.
